name: testronaut
help_text:
Usage: testronaut [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...                                                                                
                                                                                                                              
 Automated CLI Testing Framework                                                                                              
                                                                                                                              
╭─ Options ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
│ --version             -V            Show version and exit                                                                  │
│ --verbose             -v            Enable verbose output                                                                  │
│ --log-file                    TEXT  Log to file [default: None]                                                            │
│ --sql-debug                         Enable detailed SQL query logging                                                      │
│ --install-completion                Install completion for the current shell.                                              │
│ --show-completion                   Show completion for the current shell, to copy it or customize the installation.       │
│ --help                              Show this message and exit.                                                            │
╰────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─ Commands ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
│ config    Configuration management commands                                                                                │
│ analyze   Analyze CLI tools and generate test plans                                                                        │
│ execute   Execute tests from test plans                                                                                    │
│ verify    Verify test results                                                                                              │
│ db        Database management commands                                                                                     │
╰────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
description: The 'testronaut' command is an automated CLI testing framework designed to facilitate the testing of command-line tools. It provides options for configuration management, test plan analysis, execution, and verification of test results. The tool also supports database management commands and offers features such as verbose output, logging to a file, and detailed SQL query logging. Additionally, it includes options for shell completion installation and customization, aiding in efficient command...
purpose: The main purpose of 'testronaut' is to provide an automated testing framework for command-line interface (CLI) tools. It helps in analyzing CLI tools, generating test plans, executing tests, and verifying test results, thereby streamlining the testing process for CLI applications.
background: Testronaut operates within the context of software testing, specifically focusing on command-line applications. It requires an understanding of CLI operations, test plan generation, and execution. The tool also involves database management for storing test results and configurations, and it supports SQL query logging for debugging purposes.
use_cases: Analyzing CLI tools to generate automated test plans.
Executing test plans to validate the functionality of CLI applications.
Verifying the results of executed tests to ensure correctness.
Managing configurations and databases related to testing processes.
Enabling detailed logging for debugging and analysis purposes.
testing_considerations: Ensure that the CLI tool being tested is compatible with testronaut's testing framework.
Consider the environment in which the tests are executed, as different shells might affect the behavior of CLI tools.
Use the verbose and SQL debug options to gain insights into test execution and database interactions.
Regularly update test plans to accommodate changes in the CLI tools being tested.
Utilize the logging feature to maintain records of test executions and outcomes for future reference.
